## Resource:
[**Strife at *eLife*: inside a journal\'s quest to upend science publishing**](https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-00831-6)


There is an evolution in the scientific pressing system. The *eLite*, non-profit press, initiates the novel method. The manuscripts will not be rejected and instead be published with discussions between editors and authors. This transformation of the system aggressively affects in various aspects in and should be taken cautiously. The open discussions will benefit younger researchers as they can learn the directions of fields.

## Vocabulary

*relinquishing* the traditional journal role of gatekeeper. <br>
Academics were *lobbying* hard to get me fired.  <br>
If we want to fix a bad system, we do have to break some eggs.
